entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
